Hampton Bay

Cornelis G.A. Kolbach, December, 1, 2006

Hampton Bay is a proprietary brand of The Home Depot USA. For the summer season of 2007, a site dedicated to patio sets was launched. Cornelis acted as usability advisor, web standards and searchability advisor, technical director and CSS/XHTML engineer.

Watch the interactive mockup of this website.
